about_the_game:
Since 1986, HS-Schoch has been a leading expert in the creation of truck styling and accessories for the leading truck brand across Europe. The foundations of HS-Schoch's success has been built on a high level of quality awareness, flexibility, and reliability, which we are excited to represent within our virtual trucking world.

The HS-Schoch Tuning Pack contains many accessories including light bars, bump bars, sidebars, side steps, roof bars and much more for the following trucks:

  • DAF XF105
  • DAF XF
  • Iveco Stralis & Iveco Stralis Hi-Way
  • MAN TGX & TGX Euro 6
  • Mercedes-Benz Actros & Mercedes-Benz New Actros
  • Renault Magnum & Renault Trucks T
  • Scania R 2009/Streamline
  • Scania R/S
  • Volvo FH16 2009 & Volvo FH 2012
detailed_description:
Since 1986, HS-Schoch has been a leading expert in the creation of truck styling and accessories for the leading truck brand across Europe. The foundations of HS-Schoch's success has been built on a high level of quality awareness, flexibility, and reliability, which we are excited to represent within our virtual trucking world.

The HS-Schoch Tuning Pack contains many accessories including light bars, bump bars, sidebars, side steps, roof bars and much more for the following trucks:

  • DAF XF105
  • DAF XF
  • Iveco Stralis & Iveco Stralis Hi-Way
  • MAN TGX & TGX Euro 6
  • Mercedes-Benz Actros & Mercedes-Benz New Actros
  • Renault Magnum & Renault Trucks T
  • Scania R 2009/Streamline
  • Scania R/S
  • Volvo FH16 2009 & Volvo FH 2012

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Linux Ubuntu 12.04
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (2 GB)
  • Hard Drive: 15 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: recent binary ATI or NVidia drivers (MESA may not work reliably)

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.9 (Mavericks)
  • Processor: Dual core CPU 2.4 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTS 450-class (Intel HD 4000)
  • Hard Drive: 15 MB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.10 (Yosemite)
  • Processor: Quad core CPU 3.0 GHz
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 760-class (Intel HD 5300)
  • Hard Drive: 15 MB available space
